tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_computed_dates AS SELECT aav.amp_activity_id, aav.actual_start_date, aav.actual_approval_date, aav.proposed_start_date, aav.actual_completion_date, aav.proposed_completion_date, aav.original_comp_date FROM amp_activity_version aav;
